#summary Calling mixins

= getMixin() =

Each class defined via *Core.define()* method has *getMixin()* method available. This methods allows you to call methods from specific mixin.

{{{
Core.define('Draggable', Core.extend(
{
	drag: function()
	{
		alert('I am draggable');
	}
}));

Core.define('Sortable', Core.extend(
{
	drag: function()
	{
		alert('I am sortable');
	}
}));


Core.define('My.ui.element', Core.extend(
{
	test: function()
	{
		this.getMixin('draggable').drag();
	}
}).mixin(
{
	draggable: Draggable,
	sortable:  Sortable
}));
}}}
